edu.umd.cs.jazz.util
Class ZScrollPane

java.lang.Object
  |

              +--javax.swing.JComponent

                          |
                          +--edu.umd.cs.jazz.util.ZScrollPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants, java.io.Serializable
public class ZScrollPane
extends javax.swing.JScrollPane

A simple extension to a standard scroll pane that uses the jazz version of the viewport by default. Also uses the jazz version of ScrollPaneLayout

Author:
Lance Good
See Also:
Serialized Form

Inner Class Summary
protected static class ZScrollPane.ZNullAction
          An action to do nothing - put into an action map to keep it from looking to its parent
protected static class ZScrollPane.ZScrollAction
          Action to scroll left/right/up/down.
protected static class ZScrollPane.ZScrollEndAction
          Action to scroll to last visible location.
